# Binomial

> Binomial distribution.


<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var binomial = require( '@stdlib/math/base/dist/binomial' );
```

#### binomial

Binomial distribution.

``` javascript
var dist = binomial;
// returns {...}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->
